languages.text: "Ты нарушаешь правила. Снова и снова. Мне осточертел запах страха, который окутывает тебя всякий раз, когда я подношу тебе откровение. И, что хуже всего... мне скучно с тобой, {name}. Я не желаю больше тратить слова и деяния на {mf|того|ту}, кто не играет как положено".

"You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."
languages.original_text: "Ты нарушаешь правила. Снова и снова. Мне осточертел запах страха, который окутывает тебя всякий раз, когда я подношу тебе откровение. И, что хуже всего... мне скучно с тобой, {name}. Я не желаю больше тратить слова и деяния на {mf|того|ту}, кто не играет как положено".

traits.locale_text: "You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

"You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

"You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

"You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

languages.text: “你一次次地破坏规则。每当我给你新的启示时，你身上总是会散发出恐惧的恶臭。最糟糕的是……你已经让我感到厌倦了，{name}。既然你不打算好好玩这场游戏，我也不打算在你身上浪费任何时间与精力了。”
languages.original_text: "You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

traits.locale_text: “你一次次地破坏规则。每当我给你新的启示时，你身上总是会散发出恐惧的恶臭。最糟糕的是……你已经让我感到厌倦了，{name}。既然你不打算好好玩这场游戏，我也不打算在你身上浪费任何时间与精力了。”

languages.text: 「お前は、何度も何度もルールを破った。新しく貴重な体験をさせてやるたび、お前から漂う恐怖の臭いにはうんざりだぜ。それにもっと最悪なのが…俺がお前にうんざりしていることだ、{name}。正しいゲームの遊び方を拒む人間に、これ以上言葉も体も無駄に使いたくない」
languages.original_text: "You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、何度も何度もルールを破った。新しく貴重な体験をさせてやるたび、お前から漂う恐怖の臭いにはうんざりだぜ。それにもっと最悪なのが…俺がお前にうんざりしていることだ、{name}。正しいゲームの遊び方を拒む人間に、これ以上言葉も体も無駄に使いたくない」

languages.text: «Infringes las reglas una y otra vez. Estoy harto del hedor a miedo que desprendes cada vez que te muestro una nueva revelación. Y lo peor de todo... me he aburrido de ti, {name}. No deseo malgastar más palabras ni actos en alguien que se niega a respetar las reglas del juego».
languages.original_text: "You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

traits.locale_text: «Infringes las reglas una y otra vez. Estoy harto del hedor a miedo que desprendes cada vez que te muestro una nueva revelación. Y lo peor de todo... me he aburrido de ti, {name}. No deseo malgastar más palabras ni actos en alguien que se niega a respetar las reglas del juego».

languages.text: « Vous enfreignez les règles en permanence. J'en ai plus qu'assez de cette peur pestilentielle qui suinte par tous les pores de votre peau dès que je vous offre une nouvelle révélation. Pire encore... vous m'ennuyez à mourir, {name}. Je refuse de perdre davantage de temps avec {mf|un|une} pleutre qui refuse de jouer franc jeu. »
languages.original_text: "You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

traits.locale_text: « Vous enfreignez les règles en permanence. J'en ai plus qu'assez de cette peur pestilentielle qui suinte par tous les pores de votre peau dès que je vous offre une nouvelle révélation. Pire encore... vous m'ennuyez à mourir, {name}. Je refuse de perdre davantage de temps avec {mf|un|une} pleutre qui refuse de jouer franc jeu. »

languages.text: "Ihr brecht die Regeln, immer und immer wieder. Ich habe den Gestank Euer Angst so satt. Ihr gebt ihn jedes Mal ab, wenn ich Euch eine neue Offenbarung zeige. Aber das Schlimmste ist ... Dass Ihr mich langweilt, {name}. Ich habe nicht vor, weitere Worte oder Taten an Euch zu verschwenden, da Ihr Euch weigert, Euch meiner Sache richtig anzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr brecht die Regeln, immer und immer wieder. Ich habe den Gestank Euer Angst so satt. Ihr gebt ihn jedes Mal ab, wenn ich Euch eine neue Offenbarung zeige. Aber das Schlimmste ist ... Dass Ihr mich langweilt, {name}. Ich habe nicht vor, weitere Worte oder Taten an Euch zu verschwenden, da Ihr Euch weigert, Euch meiner Sache richtig anzunehmen."

languages.text: "Defalarca kuralları çiğnedin. Sana yeni bir aydınlanma yaşattığım her seferinde senden yayılan o korkunun leş kokusundan bıktım. En kötüsüyse... Senden sıkıldım {name}. Oyunu doğru düzgün oynamayı reddeden biri için ne daha fazla söz sarf etmek ne de eyleme girişmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "You break the rules, time and time again. I am sick of the stench of fear that rolls off you every time I present you with a new revelation. And worst of all... I am bored of you, {name}. I do not want to waste any more words or deeds on one who refuses to play the game properly."

traits.locale_text: "Defalarca kuralları çiğnedin. Sana yeni bir aydınlanma yaşattığım her seferinde senden yayılan o korkunun leş gibi kokusundan bıktım. En kötüsüyse... Senden sıkıldım {name}. Oyunu doğru düzgün oynamayı reddeden biri için daha fazla kelime harcamak ya da eyleme girişmek istemiyorum."
